title: FAQ - How do you find the seeding rate for different cover crops?

tasks.task: Determine seeding rate and adjust drill settings for cover crop planting.
subtasks: Review seed analysis sheet for provided seeding rate.
Calculate seeding rate using remaining seed and acreage if rate not listed.
Understand the influence of cover crop mix bushel weight on drilling settings.
Utilize bushel weight apparatus for accurate setting adjustments (if available).
Convert seed weights into bushels for drill calibration (e.g., oats and peas example).
Conduct drill calibration using seed collection and mathematical conversion (step-by-step process provided).
Utilize calibration video resources for detailed guidance on drill calibration procedures.
Properly access and review included seed analysis sheets and holders for necessary data.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Determine seeding rate and adjust drill settings for cover crops. Several subtasks list the steps to follow.
